# initialisation

## RENV (Y*ou don't need to run this everytime)*

```{r}
renv::restore()
renv::status()
```

## Loading packages

```{r}
#| label: Packages
# loading packages
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# loading personal functions
load(here("Functions", "Functions for 2T2C"))
```

# Data preparation

## loading

Place your data into the "Data" folder then enter it's file name here

```{r}
#| label: File name
FileName <- ""
```

```{r}
#| label: Data loading
read.csv(here("Data", FileName))
```
